attributes.action: ban the wearing of full face-covering forms of clothing such as the burqa and niqab in UK public spaces and buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the lead of recent discussions in the French parliament, we petition the Prime Minister to follow the lead of our European partner and move to ban full face-covering clothing such as the burqa and niqab in public buildings and spaces in the UK.

This measure would also be consistent with fully Islamic states such as Turkey where these forms of dress are also outlawed in public buildings, and proves that this measure is about public safety, not Islamophobia.
